price: Wanda ya zo da kyakkyawan aiki guda, to, yanã da mafi alhẽri daga gare shi. Kuma sũ daga wata firgita,* a yinin nan, amintattu ne.
arabic: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
footnotes: * Firgita daga azãbar Lãhira, wannan firgita ba irin ta farko ba ce wadda aka ambata a cikin ãyã ta 87, dõmin wancan firgitar kwarjini ce a bãyan tãshi daga kaburbura.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man jāa bil-ḥasanati falahu khayrun min'hā wahum min fazaʿin yawma-idhin āminūna
